trans-unit.source: Defines methods for obtaining and releasing an existing handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Definerer metoder for å skaffe og frigivelse av en eksisterende referanse til en Windows-enhetskontekst.

trans-unit.source: A device context defines the graphics object for drawing on a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: En enhetskontekst definerer grafikkobjekt for å tegne på en Windows-enhet.

trans-unit.source: An example of a class that implements the IDeviceContext interface is the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Er et eksempel på en klasse som implementerer grensesnittet IDeviceContext <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Returns the handle to a Windows device context.
GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: GetHdc og <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>to måter som gjør det mulig å hente og slipp håndtaket for en Windows-enhet.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to GetHdc with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Du må alltid følger et kall til GetHdc med et kall til <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>Når du er ferdig med Windows-referansen.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetHdc is not designed to obtain handles created using Windows GDI methods such as `CreateDC` or `CreateCompatibleDC`.
trans-unit.target: GetHdc er ikke laget for å hente håndtak opprettet ved hjelp av Windows GDI-metoder som `CreateDC` eller `CreateCompatibleDC`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of a device context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som representerer behandlingen av en enhetskontekst.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle of a Windows device context.
<xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>og ReleaseHdc finnes to metoder som gjør det mulig å hente og frigi referansen for en Windows-enhet.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to ReleaseHdc when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Du må alltid følger et kall til <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>med et kall til ReleaseHdc når du er ferdig med Windows-referansen.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>
